result.eng: Will you have another drink?
result.ga: An mbeidh deoch eile agat
result.orig: An mbeidh deoch eile agat
result.html: An mbeidh deoch eile agatWill you have another drink?
result.ponchtml: An mbeiḋ deoċ eile agatWill you have another drink?

result.eng: Will you be coming tonight?
result.ga: An mbeidh tú ag teacht anocht
result.orig: An mbeidh tú ag teacht anocht
result.html: An mbeidh tú ag teacht anochtWill you be coming tonight?
result.ponchtml: An mbeiḋ tú ag teaċt anoċtWill you be coming tonight?

result.eng: Will you still be around for another few minutes?
result.ga: An mbeidh tú fós thart go ceann cúpla nóiméad eile
result.orig: An mbeidh tú fós thart go ceann cúpla nóiméad eile
result.html: An mbeidh tú fós thart go ceann cúpla nóiméad eileWill you still be around for another few minutes?
result.ponchtml: An mbeiḋ tú fós ṫart go ceann cúpla nóiméad eileWill you still be around for another few minutes?

result.eng: Will you be in the bar tonight?
result.ga: An mbeidh tú sa bheár anocht
result.orig: An mbeidh tú sa bheár anocht
result.html: An mbeidh tú sa bheár anochtWill you be in the bar tonight?
result.ponchtml: An mbeiḋ tú sa ḃeár anoċtWill you be in the bar tonight?

result.eng: Where will we be going?
result.ga: Cá mbeidh muid ag dul
result.orig: Cá mbeidh muid ag dul
result.html: Cá mbeidh muid ag dulWhere will we be going?
result.ponchtml: Cá mbeiḋ muid ag dulWhere will we be going?

result.eng: I promise you that it will be done.
result.ga: Geallaim duit go mbeidh sé déanta
result.orig: Geallaim duit go mbeidh sé déanta
result.html: Geallaim duit go mbeidh sé déantaI promise you that it will be done.
result.ponchtml: Geallaim duit go mbeiḋ sé déantaI promise you that it will be done.

result.eng: It seems that it will be easy.
result.ga: Tá an chuma ar an scéal go mbeidh sé éasca
result.orig: Tá an chuma ar an scéal go mbeidh sé éasca
result.html: Tá an chuma ar an scéal go mbeidh sé éascaIt seems that it will be easy.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ċuma ar an scéal go mbeiḋ sé éascaIt seems that it will be easy.

result.eng: It is almost certain that we will be late.
result.ga: Tá sé geall le cinnte go mbeidh moill orainn
result.orig: Tá sé geall le cinnte go mbeidh moill orainn
result.html: Tá sé geall le cinnte go mbeidh moill orainnIt is almost certain that we will be late.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé geall le cinnte go mbeiḋ moill orainnIt is almost certain that we will be late.

result.eng: They have promised that the work will be finished soon.
result.ga: Tá sé geallta acu go mbeidh an obair críochnaithe go luath
result.orig: Tá sé geallta acu go mbeidh an obair críochnaithe go luath
result.html: Tá sé geallta acu go mbeidh an obair críochnaithe go luathThey have promised that the work will be finished soon.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé geallta acu go mbeiḋ an obair críoċnaiṫe go luaṫThey have promised that the work will be finished soon.

result.eng: I hope there won't be rain.
result.ga: Tá súil agam nach mbeidh báisteach ann
result.orig: Tá súil agam nach mbeidh báisteach ann
result.html: Tá súil agam nach mbeidh báisteach annI hope there won't be rain.
result.ponchtml: Tá súil agam naċ mbeiḋ báisteaċ annI hope there won't be rain.

result.eng: I hope I won't have to deal with those people ever again.
result.ga: Tá súil agam nach mbeidh orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arís
result.orig: Tá súil agam nach mbeidh orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arís
result.html: Tá súil agam nach mbeidh orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arísI hope I won't have to deal with those people ever again.
result.ponchtml: Tá súil agam naċ mbeiḋ orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arísI hope I won't have to deal with those people ever again.

result.eng: Maybe you can play ping-pong (table tennis) in Áras Mháirtín Uí Chadhain.
result.ga: B'fhéidir go mbeidh tú in ann leadóg bhoird a imirt in Áras Mháirtín Uí Chadhain
result.orig: B'fhéidir go mbeidh tú in ann leadóg bhoird a imirt in Áras Mháirtín Uí Chadhain
result.html: B'fhéidir go mbeidh tú in ann leadóg bhoird a imirt in Áras Mháirtín Uí ChadhainMaybe you can play ping-pong (table tennis) in Áras Mháirtín Uí Chadhain.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟéidir go mbeiḋ tú in ann leadóg ḃoird a imirt in Áras Ṁáirtín Uí ĊaḋainMaybe you can play ping-pong (table tennis) in Áras Mháirtín Uí Chadhain.

result.eng: Well, I hope that you will feel better soon.
result.ga: Bhuel tá súil agam go mbeidh biseach ort go luath
result.orig: Bhuel tá súil agam go mbeidh biseach ort go luath
result.html: Bhuel tá súil agam go mbeidh biseach ort go luathWell, I hope that you will feel better soon.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuel tá súil agam go mbeiḋ biseaċ ort go luaṫWell, I hope that you will feel better soon.

result.eng: I hope you get better soon.
result.ga: Tá súil agam go mbeidh biseach ort go luath
result.orig: Tá súil agam go mbeidh biseach ort go luath
result.html: Tá súil agam go mbeidh biseach ort go luathI hope you get better soon.
result.ponchtml: Tá súil agam go mbeiḋ biseaċ ort go luaṫI hope you get better soon.

result.eng: Will you be free tonight?
result.ga: An mbeidh tú saor anocht
result.orig: An mbeidh tú saor anocht
result.html: An mbeidh tú saor anochtWill you be free tonight?
result.ponchtml: An mbeiḋ tú saor anoċtWill you be free tonight?

result.eng: Won't Ros na Rún be on after that?
result.ga: Nach mbeidh Ros na Rún ar siúl ina dhiaidh sin
result.orig: Nach mbeidh Ros na Rún ar siúl ina dhiaidh sin
result.html: Nach mbeidh Ros na Rún ar siúl ina dhiaidh sinWon't Ros na Rún be on after that?
result.ponchtml: Naċ mbeiḋ Ros na Rún ar siúl ina ḋiaiḋ sinWon't Ros na Rún be on after that?

result.eng: Will you be flying from Shannon Airport to JFK?
result.ga: An mbeidh tú ag eitilt ó Aerfort na Sionnaine go JFK
result.orig: An mbeidh tú ag eitilt ó Aerfort na Sionnaine go JFK
result.html: An mbeidh tú ag eitilt ó Aerfort na Sionnaine go JFKWill you be flying from Shannon Airport to JFK?
result.ponchtml: An mbeiḋ tú ag eitilt ó Aerfort na Sionnaine go JFKWill you be flying from Shannon Airport to JFK?

result.eng: You will be happy to be at home again, won't you?
result.ga: Beidh tú sásta a bheith sa mbaile aríst nach mbeidh
result.orig: Beidh tú sásta a bheith sa mbaile aríst nach mbeidh
result.html: Beidh tú sásta a bheith sa mbaile aríst nach mbeidhYou will be happy to be at home again, won't you?
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ tú sásta a ḃeiṫ sa mbaile aríst naċ mbeiḋYou will be happy to be at home again, won't you?

result.eng: Won't Ros na Rún be on?
result.ga: Nach mbeidh Ros na Rún ar siúl
result.orig: Nach mbeidh Ros na Rún ar siúl
result.html: Nach mbeidh Ros na Rún ar siúlWon't Ros na Rún be on?
result.ponchtml: Naċ mbeiḋ Ros na Rún ar siúlWon't Ros na Rún be on?

result.eng: Listen, will you be at my party?
result.ga: Cogar an mbeidh tú ag mo chóisir
result.orig: Cogar an mbeidh tú ag mo chóisir
result.html: Cogar an mbeidh tú ag mo chóisirListen, will you be at my party?
result.ponchtml: Cogar an mbeiḋ tú ag mo ċóisirListen, will you be at my party?

result.eng: Will you be there yourself?
result.ga: An mbeidh tú féin ann
result.orig: An mbeidh tú féin ann
result.html: An mbeidh tú féin annWill you be there yourself?
result.ponchtml: An mbeiḋ tú féin annWill you be there yourself?

result.eng: Will you have a cup of tea, Cathal?

result.html: An mbeidh cupán tae agat a ChathailWill you have a cup of tea, Cathal?
result.ponchtml: An mbeiḋ cupán tae agat a ĊaṫailWill you have a cup of tea, Cathal?

result.eng: Will we have to put up with this whimpering for long?
result.ga: An mbeidh orainn cur suas leis an ngeonaíl seo ar feadh i bhfad
result.orig: An mbeidh orainn cur suas leis an ngeonaíl seo ar feadh i bhfad
result.html: An mbeidh orainn cur suas leis an ngeonaíl seo ar feadh i bhfadWill we have to put up with this whimpering for long?
result.ponchtml: An mbeiḋ orainn cur suas leis an ngeonaíl seo ar feaḋ i ḃfadWill we have to put up with this whimpering for long?

result.eng: Will the sun be much bigger when we're beside it?
result.ga: An mbeidh an ghrian mórán níos mó nuair a bheimid ag a taobh
result.orig: An mbeidh an ghrian mórán níos mó nuair a bheimid ag a taobh
